name: Star Battle (Timeworks)
overview: Released as part of "Entertainer III - Action/Adventure" game pack. You, the captain of the Starship Columbia, attempt to save Earth from the infamous Scyons. your ship is equipped with warp and hyper light-drive. Phasers, photon torpedoes, an advanced tracking\viewing system, and the most sophisticated onboard computer in the Star Fleet. Your capabilities are reduced each time your ship is hit by enemy fire. Can you stop the enemy ships and destroy their Starbase?
